name: shortest stick
reason: has the lowest probability of winning at the beginning

reason: Just cause I needed something to test with

reason: Awarded to the people with the most similar brackets

name: Fortified
reason: Person whose probability of winning changes the least from the first round to now

name: Joever
reason: awarded to the first person elmenated
